fields.name: deployment_id
fields.title: Deployment ID
fields.description: A unique identifier of deployment within a project. By convention this is a combination of `location_id` and `deployment_code` joined by a `-` character, but it can any string which is unique within a project.

fields.name: deployment_code
fields.description: Code which in combination with `location_id` gives a unique identifier of deployment within a project.

fields.name: start
fields.description: An ISO8601 format string e.g. `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` in UTC time. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601.

fields.name: end
fields.description: An ISO8601 format string e.g. `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` in UTC time. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601.

fields.name: cam_id
fields.description: A unique identifier of a camera amongst all cameras used in a project. This can be e.g. a camera device serial number.

fields.name: cam_model
fields.description: Manufacturer and model of camera provided in this format: `manufacturer-model`.

fields.name: cam_timestamp
fields.description: A flag indicating if a datetime settings in a camera trap were set up properly and in consequence all recorded files have proper timestamps.

fields.name: cam_interval
fields.description: Time specified between shutter triggers when activity in the sensor will not trigger the shutter. Specified in seconds.

fields.name: cam_height
fields.description: An approximate height at which a camera was deployed. Specified in centimeters.

fields.name: cam_angle
fields.description: An approximate angle used to deploy a camera. Specified in degrees e.g. 0 or 180 for a camera deployed in parallel to the ground and 90 for a perpendicular deployment.

fields.name: bait_use
fields.description: Type of bait (if any) that was used with camera. If other, more info can be provided in the `comments` field.

fields.name: session
fields.description: Camera trap deployments can be grouped into sessions (sampling 'events'). Common sessions could be seasons (wet and dry), months, years or other types of logical groupings when field sampling occurs.

fields.name: array
fields.description: A name for a logical grouping of deployments into (spatial) arrays. This could be for thematic or logistical reasons.

fields.name: feature_type
fields.description: Type of feature (if any) that camera deployment is associated with. If other, more info can be provided in the `comments` field.

fields.name: _id
fields.description: Internal attribute of data management system: ID of this deployment.
